snippet: The Atlantic States Marine Fisheries Commission meets Friday to consider imposing a strict catch limit on the menhaden, a fish that is vital to the ocean food chain but also to the fertilizer and food-supplement industry.
abstract: The Atlantic States Marine Fisheries Commission meets Friday to consider imposing a strict catch limit on the menhaden, a fish that is vital to the ocean food chain but also to the fertilizer and food-supplement industry.

headline.main: Battle Brews Over a Small, Vital Fish
